thread.section_title: Hitchweb.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hitchweb.com | hitchweb.com
thread.title: Mike Ingham

author: Mike Ingham
title: Mike Ingham
text: Shipped from BC to Ottawa due to not being available in the Ottawa area warehouse, shipment arrived over two days mixed with a blizzard in between. Looks great from what I can see right now, looking forward to mounting on my cargo trailer as soon as it warms up. Initially had seen these awnings on an Australian trailer website and then saw a local Canadian supplier at the Toronto RV show. Ordered directly from Hitchweb and will be looking forward to ordering again. Would recommend them as a great supplier and easy to deal with. Thanks for the great service.
